name: Tales of Innocence R
description:
Tales of Innocence R is a RPG game developed by Namco Tales Studio. It came out on 26-01-2012. It was published by Bandai Namco Entertainment. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play Tales of Innocence R on PS Vita.
Makoto Yoshizumi, Mika Murakita and Ryuji Ōdate produced the game. Taketoshi Inagaki directed the game. It was scored by Kazuhiro Nakamura.
